title: Gamification-Based Mobile Cybersecurity Training Course for [Large-Scale] Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic information security concepts and foundational mathematical statistics
context.additional_context: Practice-Centered Education for Pre-Service Teachers, Utilizing Gamification Elements (Badges, Leaderboards, Quests) Based on Mobile Apps in BYOD Environments

learning_goals: Learners can classify five types of cybersecurity threats and explain them using mathematical principles.
Learners can present three or more application cases of encryption algorithms through gamification task resolution.
Learners can complete team-based security scenario projects using mobile collaboration tools.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
